allow: Bash(then sed -i '' 's/""""vite"""": """"\^6\.[0-9]*\.[0-9]*""""/""""vite"""": """"^7.1.12""""/g' "$file" echo "Updated vite in $file" fi if grep -q '""""@vitejs/plugin-react"""": """"\^4\.' "$file")

Bash(then sed -i '' 's/""""@vitejs\/plugin-react"""": """"\^4\.[0-9]*\.[0-9]*""""/""""@vitejs\/plugin-react"""": """"^5.0.4""""/g' "$file" echo "Updated @vitejs/plugin-react in $file" fi if grep -q '""""vitest"""": """"\^3\.' "$file")
Bash(then sed -i '' 's/""""vitest"""": """"\^3\.[0-9]*\.[0-9]*""""/""""vitest"""": """"^4.0.1""""/g' "$file" echo "Updated vitest in $file" fi done)
